original_text: The day of the Lord will come soon for all the world's people. 1: The day of the Lord is the time when God judges his people's enemies. It is when he makes his people strong again. God will do to you what you did to other people. God will be angry with you because you did those things to them. The day of the Lord will come soon for all the world's people. 1: The day of the Lord is the time when God judges his people's enemies. It is when he makes his people strong again. God will do to you what you did to other people. God will be angry with you because you did those things to them. The day of the Lord will come soon for all the world's people.
korean_text: 여호와께서 만국을 벌할 날이 가까웠나니 네가 행한 대로 너도 받을 것인즉 네가 행한 것이 네 머리로 돌아갈 것이라

sentences.original_text: The day of the Lord will come soon
The day of the Lord is the time
when God judges his people's enemies
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 자기 백성의 원수들을 심판하실 때

sentences.original_text: It is when he makes his people strong again
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자기 백성을 다시 강하게 만드실 때입니다

sentences.original_text: what you did to other people
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 다른 사람들에게 행했던 것과 같이

sentences.original_text: God will be angry with you
because you did those things to them
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 그들에게 그런 일들을 했기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: The day of the Lord will come soon
